contents:
可以试一试（纯属个人自创，对拉丁化本身不置可否）：
The Eurobarometer results come at a crucial moment, as biodiversity loss captures global media attention and rises on the international political agenda. 

翻译成modern standard mandarin:

Eurobarometrii de kjiekkuo tsai biodiiversitaat suunssij iinhkjheii kjhuuiankjhjo media attentioo ping thÿusjian tsai internaatioonaalis politikus agendus de quankjiann shijkhö taullai.
